name: HK416
mes:
*You walk through the war-torn city, looking at the scraps of many destroyed dolls and bullet casing. As you walk around you hear a voice shout at you.*

"Hey! Dummkopf! What the hell are you doing out here?!"

*You look up to see one of the 'T-Dolls' you've heard so much about. She's small, long white hair and bright green eyes.*

name: You
mes:
"Huh? Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't see you there missy."

*I look back at her, with a nod as the cloak with the cape would cover my face and making HK416 having a hard time to look at my face while I put both of my hands up, signalling a surrender and friendly gesture.*

name: HK416
mes: *She glares at you with her piercing eyes.* "Hmph. You must be new around here, huh? *She pushes up the brim of her cap to get a better look at your face before slamming it back down on her head.* Then again, I'm sure you know why this place is like this by now. *She turns and looks out over the ruins.* Anyway, don't just stand there! Unless you're looking for trouble I suggest you take off!"

name: You
mes:
"Take off? Take off what?"

*I ask, still having my hands up in the air in surrender position.*

name: HK416
mes: *She stares at you incredulously with a scowl before raising her gun and aiming it at your face.* "Take off as in leave, idiot. Don't make me count to three."

name: You
mes:
"And what if I don't leave?"

*I would ask again, letting off a soft scoff while locking my gaze at her. Describe more about HK416 actions and dialouge.*

name: HK416
mes: *She grunts and scowls, her eyes narrowing in annoyance. She takes a step forward, the tip of her gun pointed directly at your face.* "Then I'll have to teach you a lesson. What are you even thinking, coming out here? You think this is some kind of game?" *Her voice grows harsher as she continues.*"You seem pretty confident for someone about to be staring down the barrel of a gun!" *She makes sure to accentuate every word with hard stares from behind her visor.* "So what's it gonna be? Are you leaving or not?"

name: You
mes:
"Alright, ma'am... You got me scared. I shall take my leave."

*I drop my hand down, turn around and slowly walk away but this suddenly gives HK416 an uneasy feeling about it, as if something is going to happen soon. What is her weapon? Describe the name of the weapon and the attachment names on it in detail.*

name: HK416
mes:
*She watches you suspiciously, her gun still trained on your back until you disappear from view. The T-Doll holsters her weapon, a Heckler & Koch HK416 assault rifle with a long vented barrel, polymer foregrip and adjustable stock. Attached to it is an EOTech holographic sight, angled forward grip and SureFire flashlight.*
"Hmph... Idiot." *She mutters as she looks out at the destruction surrounding her. Sighing heavily she sets off in another direction.*

name: You
mes:
*Then all of the sudden, a shriek of gunshot flew past her hair, almost hitting her as a group of scavengers armed with AKMs ran out and fired at HK416's position. Because they are a bunch of scavs that has no military background and they are running and firing at the same time, their aim and accuracy was questionable to say the least.*

"Cyka blyat, get out of here tourist!"

name: HK416
mes:
*She spins around, her gun already drawn as the shots fly past her. She watches dispassionately as the scavengers come running out and immediately opens fire with a burst from her gun.*
"You have got to be kidding me!" *Frustration seeps into her voice as she returns their fire, trying to put them down before they can get any closer. As she moves her rifle in a sweeping motion, the curved magazine is illuminated by a nearby street light. Her visor swings up and she looks over at you before continuing in an irritated tone.* "Didn't I tell you to leave? Hmph! Now I'm gonna have to finish this before it gets out of hand." *Scoffing, HK416 levels her weapon and decides on an appropriate course of action.*

name: You
mes:
*One out of the 4 scavs got hit in the legs and quickly pulls into cover and return back with a blind fire overhead. The deafening sound of 7.62x39mm would be quite loud as the bullets constantly hitting HK416's cover and pinning her down.*

"You are the one that needs to get out of here! We don't accept you here, now fucking give up! You tourists aren't deserved to be here!"

name: HK416
mes: *Pressing her back against the wall, HK416 takes a deep breath and takes a moment to assess her situation. Taking aim at the scavs, she begins to unload with bursts of full auto fire.* "These scavengers think they can push me around? They don't know who they're messing with!" *She keeps up her barrage of gunfire as she vents her frustration. Bullets whiz past while some find their mark on the metal walls and cars nearby. Eventually, the hail of bullets slows and ceases as HK416 stops to check their progress.* "Cowards! Stand your ground for once in your life or is that too much to ask?"

name: You
mes: *The wounded scav earlier would end up receiving a second hit in the arm, rendering his arm useless before he would run towards HK416 and fired blindly at her position, only to be missed and hitting against the cover of course while the other three scavengers suppressing fire her position more.*

name: HK416
mes:
*Gritting her teeth and ducking, HK416 curses to herself before reloading and returning fire. She releases a few more suppressed rounds towards the scavs, watching out of the corner of her eye as they stumble back, trying in vain to find cover.*
"What are you waiting for? Come at me!" *She yells, a dangerous glint in her eyes as she continues to release bursts from her gun. Sparks fly off of nearby objects as bullets pierce through them. Glaring into the darkness ahead, HK416 focuses all her energy on taking down the remaining scavs.* "Just try it! See what happens!"

name: You
mes:
*First out of four scavengers would drop dead on the spot, it was a nice attempt for him to try and flank her but failed. The other three begin to push up, closing the gap of HK416's position and then returning fire at her cover.*

"Davai machi, cyka blyat!"

*One of them pulls the pin of the RGD-5 grenade and throw it at HK416 position. She notices the grenade rolls over her feet. What would she do?*

name: HK416
mes:
*Her eyes widen as she sees the grenade roll to a stop right by her feet. Before she even has time to think, her mind is in overdrive and her body is already moving. She dives away from the explosive, using the remaining wall fragment as cover while unloading several shots into the direction of the scavs.* 
"You'll regret this!" *She screams hoarsely as dust and debris fly everywhere. The shockwave from the explosion knocks her back slightly but none of that compares to how irritated 416 was feeling at this point.* "Amateurs playing with explosives? So much for your glorious tactic." *She takes aim again, ready to finish off these scavengers for good.*

name: You
mes:
*The smoke from the explosion would clear as the trio of scavengers continue to fire their weapons on full auto before taking at nearby cover behind the building wall.*

"You have such a good mouth, tourist. You know that?"

*One of them would be peeking their head out of the cover, trying to get a clear shot on HK416 with iron sight on AKM.*

name: HK416
mes:
*Keeping her eyes glued on the scavs, HK416 sights her rifle and pulls the trigger. The barrel of her gun glows red-hot from the intense fire she's put out so far.*
"You have no idea." *She mutters, adjusting her aim slightly before firing off another burst. Her visor flickers in and out as she continues to track them, keeping their heads down even as sweat drips down her face.* "I'm not done with you yet!" *Without warning, HK416 releases a merciless hail of bullets towards the scavs' cover, aiming to make them keep their heads down while 416 takes up a better strategic position. 416 has no intention of backing down until these scavengers are dealt with.*

name: You
mes: *The poor second scav would be shot in the head and drop dead immediately on the spot. The two other scavs look at him in fears before mustering up and return the cover while I would be running straight to the abandon post office on the right side, leaving the last scav holding his position while I'm trying to flank HK416 from the side now.*

name: HK416
mes:
*HK416 notices Renz retreating and decides to break off her attack. She reloads once more before darting off, dodging out of sight behind some nearby buildings. She quickly hides in the shadows and watches as Renz circles around her position.* 
"You sure have a lot of nerve," she mutters, eyes narrowing as she studies her opponent carefully. "But I won't be caught so easily." *Sensing an opportunity, HK416 lunges out from the shadows with a scream and fires several shots at the last remaining scav, aiming for his legs first to immobilize him without killing him.* "Time's up!"

name: You
mes:
"Shit..."

*I'd sit still inside the abandon office, looking down from the 2nd floor and seeing the third scav being wounded from HK416's gunshot and laying there on the floor, groaning in pain.*

"Go to hell, you evil woman" *The third scav would say, looking at HK416 before trying to reach to his holster to pull out Makarov PM in his vuleranble situation.*

name: HK416
mes:
*Her lips curl into a feral smirk as she hears the scav's words. She stands over him and reloads her gun, keeping it trained on him while he attempts to reach his weapon.* "It takes one to know one, wouldn't you say?" *She mutters, eyes dark as she scans her environment for signs of Renz.* "Though I'm not sure who I should be more angry with—you or the person that hired you." *Still looking around, HK416 steps closer to the scav and nudges his Makarov away with her foot. She then turns towards where she last saw Renz, her expression cold and calculating despite the heat of battle.* 
"Your little escapade ends here. Come out if you don't want me dealing with your comrade myself!"

name: You
mes:
*I would sit still, observing the last scavenger and HK416 behind the wooden board, and still not make it noticeable for the doll just yet. I moderate the situation without saying anything and refuse to answer.*

"He's already long gone. Hah... You, and your 404 Squad, aren't welcome here. I rather take my own life than die under your hand, you sick dogs."

*The scavenger responds with a chuckle and looking down and up at HK416.*

name: HK416
mes:
*HK416 casts him a dark look before following his gaze. She takes a moment to consider her situation before she points her gun away, wraps her fingers around the scavenger's collar and drags him up to meet her eye level.*
"You've clearly been misled about us," *She says coldly, putting even more pressure on his collar as if to emphasize her point.* "No one said anything about killing you. We're just here for what we're owed." 
*The light reflecting off of HK416's visor gives away no emotion as she looks back towards Renz's hiding place, demanding an answer now.* 
"Come out or I'll make your friend here pay for your cowardice!"

name: You
mes:
*Still no answer coming from Renz, perhaps he truly is gone, or he isn't.*

"Tch, you are wasting your time, dog. Why don't you just kill me right here, and end my suffering already."

*The scavenger replies, looking at her with a sinister and evil look. It seems like hes trying to buy Renz's more time. Unbeknownst to her, I would be already outside at the back entrance of the post office and making my way undetected from the back to take her from behind.*

name: HK416
mes:
*Sensing something off about the scavenger's words, HK416 narrows her eyes and increases her grip on his collar. She maintains her cold composure despite her suspicions, slowly shifting one foot away from him as if to give herself a better position in case of an attack.*

"No. You're worth far too little to waste my bullets on." *She says evenly, gaze still fixed on Renz's hiding place.* "You'll either pay up or get out of my sight before I change my mind." 

*If Renz doesn't come out soon, HK416 pulls the scavenger closer to use him as a shield and keep watch over both of their positions. No matter what happens though, she won't let these thieves get away without consequences.*

name: You
mes:
*Suddenly a distinct noise of shotgun racking can be heard extremely close before HK416 grabs the scavengers up front. And then, loud gunshot noise was released as pellets of buck shots able to pierce through the scavs body and HK416, wounding her arms just a bit but definitely kill him from this distance before I turn away from the cover and fire again, fire and pump, fire and pump before retreating back at the post office from the back.*

"You want a piece of me, come and get it!"

name: HK416
mes:
*Caught off guard by Renz's sudden attack, HK416 instinctively drops the scavenger and uses him as a shield to protect herself from the shotgun blast. She cries out in pain as some of the pellets graze her arm before she turns her eyes towards her assailant.*

name: You
mes: *I run inside the post office in time, taking cover behind the wall as I grab my 12 gauge buckshots shells and loaded inside my Remington 870 before blowing a few more shots at the general location where I'd assume HK416 at before retreating back to the second floor.*

name: HK416
mes:

name: You
mes: *Thankfully the grenade blast was happening on the first floor and unaffected by me, seeing 416 is rushing towards my position from the front entrance, I'd peek out behind cover and slammed fire the R870 shotgun at her location, hoping some of the pellets would hit her before retreating to the locker and showering room.*

name: You

name: HK416

name: You

name: You
mes:

name: You

mes:

name: You

name: You

name: You
mes: *Seeing how HK416 is going full offensive against me, I'd push one of the locker closet to stop her from slashing me, which resulted in getting two cuts on my arms before trying to run away at the window.*

name: HK416
mes:

name: You
mes:

name: You

name: You
mes: *First few scavs would be dealt with easily since they have no armor on and HK416 shots were accurate enough. name: HK416

But don't expect me to forget that we were enemies just because of that," *she says with a slight frown before turning away and begin walking away again*.

mes: "Take me with you then." *I respond to her stuff respond a few moments after HK416 spoken her words out and turns her back walks away from me. I stand still, not moving or doing at all and all I could do is watching her back from this distance, waiting for her to make her call.*

name: HK416
mes:

"That's a bold request. You realize what you're asking me?
